card.name: Sunken Ruin, Voice of Chaos
card.text:
Lifelink
{r}, {t}: Flip a coin. If you win the flip, Sunken Ruin, Voice of Chaos deals 3 damage to a target of your choice. If you lose the flip, Sunken Ruin, Voice of Chaos deals damage to a target of your opponent's choice.
{3}{b}, {t}: Flip a coin. If you win the flip, destroy target creature of your choice. If you lose the flip, destroy target creature of your opponent's choice.

card.name: Aster, Companion Adept
card.text:
Defender
Instant and sorcery spells cost {1} less to cast.
Whenever a player casts an instant or sorcery spell, that player creates an X/X green and blue Elemental creature token, where X is that spell's mana value.

card.name: Baron Alabaster Sagaxus
card.text:
Defender
Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, untap Baron Alabaster Sagaxus and it loses defender until end of turn.
{1}{g/w}, {t}: Put a +0/+1 counter on target creature. You gain 1 life.

card.name: Call Lightning
card.text:
Call Lightning deals 3 damage to any target. Exile Call Lightning with one time counter on it.
Suspend 3 -- {3}{r} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may {3}{r} and exile it with three time counter on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its cost.)

card.name: Catnip Vial
Chocolate Milk Thermos
card.text: At the beginning of each end step, if you gained life, create a Food token. (It's an artifact with "{2}, {t}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.")

card.name: Coffee Cat
card.text:
Flash
When Coffee Cat enters the battlefield, choose one or both: •Counter target instant or sorcery spell. •Copy target instant or sorcery spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.
When Coffee Cat dies or is put into exile from the battlefield, you may put it in into its owner's library seventh from the top.

card.name: Chris, Playful Prankster
card.text:
Hexproof
{1}{B}{R}: Create a black Aura curse enchantment token named Prank attached to target opponent. The token has enchant player and "At the beginning of enchanted player's upkeep, they lose 1 life and you gain 1 life."

card.name: Dynamite
card.text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, if Dynamite is in your graveyard, you may {2}{r}. If you do, return Dynamite to your hand.
Whenever equipped creature is dealt damage, sacrifice Dynamite and it deals 4 damage to equipped creature.
Equipped creature has "{t}, Sacrifice Dynamite: Dynamite deals 4 damage to any target."
Equip {1}

card.name: Harmonious Repetition
card.text: {3}: Copy target instant or sorcery spell you control. You may choose new targets for it. Any player may activate this ability.

card.name: Gambling Addiction
card.text:
Enchant creature
Whenever enchanted creature would deal damage to a permanent or player, flip a coin. If you win the flip, it deals double that damage to that permanent or player instead. If you lose the flip, prevent all damage enchanted creature would deal.

card.name: Kitsune, God of Illusions
card.text:
Indestructible
As long as your devotion to black and red is less than seven, Kitsune isn't a creature.
At the beginning of your upkeep, flip two coins. For each flip you win, each opponent either discards a card or loses 3 life.

card.name: Holly, Liberator of Neelai
card.text:
Partner with Procyon, Faithful Companion
Whenever Holly, Liberator of Neelai attacks, you may have your creatures assign their combat damage as though they weren't blocked.

card.name: Procyon, Faithful Companion
card.text:
Partner with Holly, Liberator of Neelai
Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to a player, draw a card.

card.name: Desensitization
card.text: Choose one: •Blindness -- Target creature gets -2/-0 until end of turn. Whenever that creature is dealt damage this turn, that creature is dealt double that damage instead. •Deafness -- Tap target creature. It doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step. Draw a card.

card.name: Temple of Kitsune
card.text: {t}: Flip a coin. If you win the flip, you gain {B}{R}. If you lose the flip, target opponent gains {B}{R} at their next precombat main phase.

card.name: Wrath of the Storm
card.text: Choose target creature you control. Whenever that creature is dealt damage from a creature source until end of turn, Wrath of the Storm deals that much damage to that creature. Whenever that creature is dealt damage from a noncreature source until end of turn, Wrath of the Storm deals that much damage to that source's controller.

card.name: Stabilization
card.text: Regenerate target creature. Draw a card.

card.name: Induction to the Fox God
card.text: Flip X coins. For each flip you win, gain control of target creature until end of turn. It gains haste until end of turn.

card.name: Dani, Mythbusting Chemist
card.text:
If Dani, Mythbusting Chemist is your commander, choose any number of colors before the game begins. Dani, Mythbusting Chemist are those chosen colors.
{t}:Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity. {t}: Draw a card. Activate only if you created a token this turn.

card.name: Fellyr Infestation
card.text: Create X green and white Cat tokens called Fellyr with "This creature's power and toughness are equal to the number of cats you control."

card.name: Digital Deluge
card.text:
Enchant Player
At the beginning of enchanted player's upkeep, that player creates three 0/1 colorless Pixels tokens with "When this creature dies, it deals 1 damage to you."
If enchanted player has no creatures, sacrifice Digital Deluge and enchanted player loses 10 life.

card.name: Winnow the Weak
card.text: Each player chooses a creature with the greatest power amongst creatures they control. Each player sacrifices all creatures except the chosen creature.

card.name: Gambler's Coins
card.text:
Whenever you win a coin flip, put a luck counter on Gambler's Coins. Then if it has seven or more luck counters on it, remove them and transform Gambler's Coins.
{t}: Flip a coin. If you win the flip, add {c}.

card.name: Gambler's Vault
card.text: {t}: Add one mana of any color. {2}, {t}: Double the amount of each type of unspent mana you have.

card.name: The Prisoner's Dilemma
card.text:
Choose target opponent. You select a nonland permanent you control and they control.
Both of you simultaneously vote for split or steal. If steal has more votes, exile both permanents. If the vote is tied, the player who voted steal takes control of the other's permanent. If split has more votes, each player loses life equal to their selected permanent's mana cost.

card.name: Organ Donation
card.text: Sacrifice a creature: Draw a card. Any player may activate this ability.

card.name: Stubborn Bet
card.text: Flip a coin. If you win the flip, copy target instant or sorcery spell twice. You may choose new targets for the copy. If you lose the flip, Stubborn Bet deals 3 damage to you.

card.name: Recruiting of the Dragon... Guild
card.text: Tempting Offer -- Create a Treasure token and draw a card. Each opponent may create a Treasure token and draw a card. For each opponent who does, create a Treasure token and draw a card.

card.name: Las Vanitas
card.text: {t}: Add {c}. {t}: Flip a coin. If you win the flip, gain {3}. If you lose the flip, target opponent gains control of Las Vanitas. Untap it.

card.name: Mikhail, Scholar of the Dark Arts
card.text:
When Mikhail, Scholar of the Dark Arts enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a card named The Forbidden Codex, reveal it, put it in your hand, then shuffle.
Whenever you lose life for the first time on your turn, you may sacrifice a creature. If you do, exile target creature.

card.name: The Forbidden Codex
card.text: {t}, Pay 1 life: Create a 1/1 black Rat creature token. {t}, Sacrifice a creature: Draw a card. {6}, {t}, Pay 6 life, Sacrifice 6 creatures: Create a 13/13 black legendary Demon creature called Baphomet with flying, indestructible, and haste.

card.text: 1: Each player creates a Treasure token.

card.text:
Target creature loses all its abilities and becomes a green Cat creature with power and toughness equal to its mana value.

Affinity for artifacts (This spell costs {1} less for each artifact you control.)

card.name: Echollector Sonarch III
card.text:
Flying
Whenever Echollector Sonarch III deals combat damage, put a greed counter on Echollector Sonarch III.
Remove a greed counter on Echollector Sonarch III, choose one: •Make two treasure tokens. •Exile the top card of target opponent’s library. If it’s a noncreature card, you may play that card this turn, and you may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast this spell.

card.name: High Stakes Auction
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, exile the top card of each player's library. You bid any amount of life. In turn order, each player may top the high bid. The bidding ends if the high bid stands. The high bidder loses life equal to the high bid and may play the exiled cards without paying its mana cost.

card.name: Kartoon, Game Boy
card.text: Flash Whenever Kartoon, Game Boy enters the battlefield, choose one: •Buffer -- Exile target permanent with three time counters. If it doesn't have suspend, it gains suspend. •Disconnect -- Counter target spell.

card.name: Take Hostage
card.text:
You can’t cast this spell unless you dealt combat damage this turn.
Enchant creature owned by target opponent that was dealt combat damage
You control enchanted creature. Tap it. That creature doesn’t untap during its controller’s untap phase.
If you are dealt combat damage, sacrifice Take Hostage.

card.name: Take No Prisoners
card.text:
You can’t cast this spell unless you dealt combat damage this turn.
Destroy all creatures target opponent controls if they were dealt combat damage this turn.

card.name: Hour Devourer

A deck can have any number of cards named Hour Devourer.

card.name: Meowlligan
card.text: Each player may shuffle their hand into their library. Each player that shuffled their hand this way draws cards equal to the cards they had in hand plus one. Each player that did not shuffle their hand into their library draws a card.

card.name: Race for Treasure Island
card.text:
At the beginning of each upkeep, each player flips a coin. If that player wins the flip, that player creates a Treasure token.

Lifelink

card.name: The Tower
card.text:
You can only cast The Tower if your life total is half of the starting life total.
{t}, Add a Chaos counter: Tap all your lands, then lose all unspent mana. Destroy all other nonland permanents you control. Activate only as sorcery.
{t}, Remove all Chaos counters from The Tower: Tap all lands target opponent controls, then they lose all unspent mana. Destroy all nonland permanents they control.

Enchant Creature
